SELECT uuid, user_id AS userId, amount, type_id AS typeId, reason FROM tb_amect WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_amect SET amount = #{amount}, type_id = #{typeId}, reason = #{reason} WHERE id = #{id} AND status != 2
mapper.sql: FROM tb_amect a JOIN tb_amect_type `at` ON a.type_id=`at`.id JOIN tb_user u ON a.user_id=u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(`at`.id) AS ct, `at`.type FROM tb_amect a JOIN tb_amect_type `at` ON a.type_id=`at`.id JOIN tb_user u ON a.user_id=u.id
GROUP BY `at`.id

SELECT "20元以内" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.amount >=0 AND a.amount < 20
UNION SELECT "50元以内" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.amount >=20 AND a.amount < 50
UNION SELECT "100元以内" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.amount >=50 AND a.amount < 100
UNION SELECT "200元以内" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.amount >=100 AND a.amount < 200
UNION SELECT "其他" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.amount >=200

SELECT "未付款" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.`status`=1
UNION SELECT "已付款" AS title, COUNT(*) AS ct
WHERE a.`status`=2
SELECT MONTH(create_time) AS month, COUNT(*) AS ct FROM tb_amect WHERE YEAR(create_time)=#{year} AND `status`=#{status} GROUP BY MONTH(create_time)
